text.section: A controlled dangerous substance listed in Schedule V may not be distributed or dispensed except for a medical purpose.

When dispensing the controlled dangerous substance, an authorized provider shall securely affix to the container, in addition to any other label already there, a label with:
the dispenser's name, signature, and registry number;
the date on which the controlled dangerous substance is dispensed; and
the purchaser's name.
